content:
Monday:
Breakfast: Greek yogurt, berries, almonds
Lunch: Grilled chicken, vegetables, quinoa

Tuesday:
Breakfast: Omelette with spinach and feta
Lunch: Leftover grilled chicken, vegetables, quinoa

Wednesday:
Breakfast: Peanut butter and banana smoothie
Lunch: Salmon, asparagus, brown rice

Thursday:
Breakfast: Oatmeal with protein powder and blueberries
Lunch: Leftover salmon, asparagus, brown rice

Friday:
Breakfast: Scrambled eggs with avocado and tomatoes
Lunch: Shrimp stir-fry with broccoli and brown rice

Ingredients:

* Greek yogurt
* Berries
* Almonds
* Grilled chicken
* Vegetables
* Quinoa
* Spinach
* Feta
* Peanut butter
* Banana
* Salmon
* Asparagus
* Brown rice
* Protein powder
* Avocado
* Tomatoes
* Shrimp
* Broccoli

Weekly Meal Schedule:

| Day | Breakfast | Lunch |
| --- | --- | --- |
| Mon | Greek yogurt, berries, almonds | Grilled chicken, vegetables, quinoa |
| Tue | Omelette with spinach and feta | Leftover grilled chicken, vegetables |
|  |  | quinoa |
| Wed | Peanut butter and banana smoothie | Salmon, asparagus, brown rice |
| Thu | Oatmeal with protein powder and | Leftover salmon, asparagus, brown |
|  | blueberries | rice |
| Fri | Scrambled eggs with avocado and | Shrimp stir-fry with broccoli and |
|  | tomatoes | brown rice |
